korean: 친구들과 함께 근처 산에 등산을 갔다.
올라갈 때는 힘들었지만 정상에서 본 경치가 정말 멋있었어.
다음에는 더 높은 산에 도전해보고 싶다.
english: I went hiking on a nearby mountain with friends.
It was tough climbing up, but the view from the summit was amazing.
Breathing the fresh air made me feel refreshed.
Next time, I want to challenge a higher mountain.
